thig5.11:2.4: sit in a discreet place to meditate.
thig5.11:3.4: and retired to a discreet place.
thig5.11:4.1: In the first watch of the night,
thig5.11:4.3: In the middle watch of the night,
thig5.11:4.5: In the last watch of the night,
thig5.11:4.6: they shattered the mass of darkness.
thig5.11:5.1: They rose and paid homage at her feet:
thig5.11:5.4: as the thirty gods honor Indra,
thig5.11:5.6: Masters of the three knowledges, <j>we are free of defilements.”
thig5.11:6.1: That is how thirty senior nuns declared their enlightenment in the presence of Paṭācārā.
